verbs.description: [ARG0: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] [V: says] [ARG1: North Korea could get relief from sanctions if it abandons its nuclear program entirely . He also discussed the preparations for the upcoming summit between President Trump and Kim Jong Un in Singapore , and efforts to craft a different Iran nuclear deal] .

Secretary of State Mike Pompeo says North Korea [V: could] get relief from sanctions if it abandons its nuclear program entirely . He also discussed the preparations for the upcoming summit between President Trump and Kim Jong Un in Singapore , and efforts to craft a different Iran nuclear deal .
